A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it!! It gave us something new while giving us everything we love about this world already. It expanded the universe further and took the story in a direction I don't think anyone saw coming. Sure\, there's some plot threads that feel unnecessarily long and don't really go anywhere but the central focus of the clear and it challenges our perceptions of how this universe works which I love.\nCan't wait for IX now.
